title: BRIEF-Bacanora Says Focused On Commencing Construction Of 35,000 Tpa Operation At Sonora In H1 2018
text: March 2, 2018 / 7:38 AM / in an hour BRIEF-Bacanora Says Focused On Commencing Construction Of 35,000 Tpa Operation At Sonora In H1 2018 Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 2 (Reuters) - Bacanora Minerals Ltd: * REMAIN FOCUSED ON COMMENCING CONSTRUCTION OF 35,000 TPA OPERATION AT SONORA IN H1 2018 WITH A VIEW TO ACHIEVING FIRST PRODUCTION IN Q1 2020â€‹ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
